segments.text: Observing this line drawing, it's a standard kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets ajar, lower ones with water damage starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman faces away, focused on her plate drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow from the sink is relentless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, hand in cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilting back, on the verge of collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing a plate too—what is he thinking?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm up in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside contrasts sharply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for what comes next.
segments.speaker: PAR
